Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Western due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Shuttle buses has been requested to provide connecting service from Roosevelt to Midway.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

This may include:
#62/Archer

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
